name: The Witch and The Knight
description:
The Witch and The Knight is a story about a husband and wife, who are also a knight and a witch and are going on a quest to cure their daughter from a dark curse. Their bizzare adventure is not a piece of cake as they confront dangerous drunk dragons, sick minotaurs, but also they themselves stand in their own way.

WARNING!

If you don´t like emotional stories, humor, fun, don´t play this game.

If you don´t like dark themes, alcohol, children, don´t play this game.

I know you´re asking, what kind of a game is this and it´s a good thing to ask, because questions make you curious and that makes you try new things, which means you´ll be able to relate with the characters in the game. Life is hard. Life is an adventure. You go through painful times, therefore to feel better, you can and you must break through the pain, which enables you to move on with life after you´ve finished this game.

FEATURES: 

  • Hrvatski Voice Over
  • Narrative Driven
  • Multiple Choices

Created by: Kevin Mainenti

Art Design: Magdalena Klobučar Ledinščak

Voice Over: Viktorija Matko, Josip Ćetković, Marino Lencović, Maja Grbešić, Dina Uglešić, Pavao Bobinac, Dominik Rački, Kristian Krivačić, Lucija Lukrecija Jelčić, Mateo Šoštarić, Kevin Mainenti, Jan Humski

Sound Mixing: Juraj Franolić

Future Updates:

  • English voice over (you can contact me)
  • Android version
  • Mac version

This game is made in RPG Maker MV as proof that you can make a game with zero programming skills. You just need an idea and a creative mind, with a little discipline on top (and two years to spare).
